review: We bought this after having bought the Fire TV Stick.  Not sure we actually needed this full size edition but we do love it.  Playback starts quickly and I really makes accessing your library and Prime videos and music super easy.  The voice remote is fantastic too.
author: Eric in CT

review: Had to replace the remote three times in less than a year. The last time was last week. Need to address the reliability issue with the remote.
author: Minh Vu

review: Great ítem for prime users everything in one.Just a suggestion will like to more different aps and more Amazon series  the previous of some of them looks great  will love to see more.
author: RAFAEL ESTRADA

review: Set up is a breeze - remote is easy to navigate. This is the second media streamer I've owned and this one is more stable that the Sony SMP-100 it replaced. Debated between this and Roku, but the natural tie-in between the Amazon Fire TV and my Prime music, watch list and library tipped the scales. Just wish I could get Acorn TV on this one.
author: kurt odenwald

review: One of the best gifts I've given my wife.  She loves it and even shows it off to friends.  I bought the game controllers too and we now have games that we play together.  She actually let me disconnect her playstation which cleaned up some wiring.
author: Diego J.

review: The box works great exceeded my expectations. Best feature is the search by voice. Someone deserve a "Borat" high five for that ideal. Thanks again Amazon.
author: charles polston

review: With Amazon Prime, installing Fire TV is completely brainless.  Great job by Amazon getting this right!  It comes pre-installed with your Prime settings -- simply unpack, plug it in, plug in the HDMI, turn it on and follow the on-screen prompts -- takes MAYBE 10 minutes.  Small, easy to use and nearly invisible, Amazon -- with Sling TV -- has just changed TV + streaming for the better!!  Say goodbye to bundled cable extortion!
author: Jethro
